desc.en: Prepare to be BLOWN AWAY with the view from this second floor unit. It is the most coveted building in the community, located right next to Tradewinds Bar and Grill AND has an incredible view of the beach and lake from the rear patio! If you have never driven into this community before, you are in for a treat! As soon as you make the turn in, you will feel transported to the Caribbean with the lush landscaping that encompasses you. As already noted, the real star of the show here is the location of the unit in the resort as well as the spectacular views provided behind the unit! Imagine waking up in the morning, sitting on the patio with a cup of coffee, and watching the hot air balloons pass over the lake behind you (yes, they do fly over here some days!). If that didn't sell you alone, let's take a tour of the condo itself. Step in through the front door, and you will notice that this floor plan has split bedrooms. Upon first entering, there is a bedroom with a queen bed on one side of the property, and on the other side is a bedroom with two twin beds. Continuing on, you will notice a formal dining area, and right before that is the second bathroom. Past this area is the kitchen, which also offers additional bar stool seating. The living room and master bedroom offer fantastic views of the woods, sandy beach, and lake behind this condo. Both also have sets of sliding glass doors that lead out to screened patios. The master bedroom has an ensuite master bathroom with a tub and shower combo. Short term / transient residency is permitted in this community- no long term leasing or full-time residents, making it a true vacation resort. The monthly condo fee covers all utilities except electricity. The amenities the community offers are endless walking trails, an on-site restaurant, on-site spa, fitness center, tennis court, volleyball court, and even a sandy beach next to the lake! This unit is currently being managed by the onsite manager, Vacasa, but you can use whatever property management company you want in this community. Please be advised that normal conventional loans will not work in this community due to it being 100% investment. You would need to pay cash, or do a condotel loan for this condo. Lender recommendations are available, if needed.

Finally, there is the upper primary - a true retreat from the theme park hustle and is a room which adds flexibility to the home in general as it adds an extra owner's suite. desc.en: Welcome to luxury living at its finest! Presenting a stunning 5-bedroom designer manor, this contemporary masterpiece boasts over 5,000 square feet of modern elegance situated on a sprawling .73-acre lakefront lot in the highly sought-after gated community of Kissimmee Bay Golf and Country Club. As you approach this majestic residence by its circular driveway, you are greeted by the grand entrance, adorned with a mahogany door, open to reveal a soaring double-height foyer, a neutral color scheme and elegant windows showcasing the lake, mature foliage and breathtaking sunrises. Step inside, and you'll find a seamless open floor plan enhanced with exquisite tile flooring. The modern kitchen features an abundance of storage cabinets and closets. The expansive living spaces include 5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, 2 offices, as well as living and dining areas, providing versatility for various lifestyle. The allure of this home extends beyond its interiors to the covered enclosed outdoor lanai. Here, you'll discover a summer kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, refrigerator, sink, and a new Synergy wood ceiling - perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying quiet evenings by the pool. The pool area is a haven of relaxation, complemented by views of the bass-filled East Lake Toho. For added convenience and peace of mind, this technologically advanced property features a generator for the complete downstairs, a safe room used as a master closet, and 3 newer air conditioner units. A central vac system, 360 degrees surveillance cameras, electronic remote storm shutters, and 2 electronic lanai awnings contribute to the home's modern amenities. The 3-car side entry garage provides ample space for all your vehicles and showcases tiled flooring along with ceiling to floor built-in cabinets. Kissimmee Bay Golf and Country Club offers resort-style living with a community boat ramp, boat and RV storage, tennis courts, pickleball, basketball, a playground, a golf course, and a clubhouse with a restaurant. Additionally, the location is unbeatable - just minutes away from the Orlando International Airport, Disney World, medical facilities, shopping and dining. This location affords easy access to major highways, including the Florida Turnpike, 417, and the 528. The recent addition of the Brightline train allows seamless connectivity to the best of Florida. Make this exquisite lakefront residence in Kissimmee Bay your new home!

desc.en: This awesome and rare almost-new pool home in the guard gated 55+ community of Four Seasons has loads of luxe upgrades. With 1,970 sq ft, 3 bedrooms, 2 baths and an extra large lot, you have space for guests and a home office. A paver driveway greets you upon walking up to the beautiful, beveled glass front door. Inside you'll find an oversized foyer, and wood-look ceramic tile flooring that runs through the entire abode. Listen to the relaxing sound of cascading water from the poolside Restoration Hardware fountain tucked away in the extra lush and private Key West inspired tropical landscaping (wait until dark when the custom outdoor lighting turns on). Cook up a feast for all your friends and neighbors on the separate outside cooking station with BBQ Island Paradise Grill. Luxury Travertine stone paver patio surrounds the upgraded Pebble Tech finished heated pool. A fully fenced oversized backyard is perfect for pets and the large grassy lawn can't be beat (and HOA takes care of all lawn mowing, shrub trimming, and watering). The 12,000 sq ft clubhouse has a fitness center, bar space, event spaces, lounge area, kitchen, and screened porch. In addition is a resort pool, family pool and spa, as well as pickleball, bocce, and tennis courts, and a full-time activity director keeps the fun going 7 days a week. Come live the carefree, elegant lifestyle in this active adult resort neighborhood. Close to Disney, Celebration shops and restaurants, and nearby highways taking you east to Orlando or west to Tampa - 1975 Flora Pass Place has it ALL.

desc.en: Expect to be impressed with this 7-bedroom, fully furnished pool home in Solara, an active short-term rental resort community. This home is designed with holidays in mind - ideal for you to own as your own vacation home or as an income opportunity as a rental. Easily sleeps 14; designed for multi-family stays. The common living space on the ground floor makes for a great gathering spot - spacious area to relax and dine. Beautiful contemporary kitchen boasts expansive island/breakfast bar, plenty of counter/cabinet space, and a dining nook that can seat a crowd. This entire area looks out onto your covered patio and pool. Split bedroom plan with main primary suite on the ground floor, complete with ensuite bath/shower. The remaining bedrooms are upstairs; each has a unique, contemporary dÃ©cor which will appeal to young and old alike. The three full baths here are "Jack "˜n Jills" - one bath for every two bedrooms - making it easy for a full house to prepare for an exciting, active day in Central Florida. The home also has two other areas of entertainment -loft space w/flat screen TV and the garage, which is set up for gaming. If you want a quiet day of leisure, consider spending time lounging around your screen enclosed pool and expansive paver lanai. Here you can enjoy outdoor grilling/dining and good old-fashioned fun in the sun. All this backs up to a conservation lot - having no rear neighbors gives you a nice bit of privacy. One of the benefits of living in Solara is the fantastic amenity center. It's a multi-acre complex that includes a climate-controlled pool, a splash pad for the younger set, an incredible surf simulator (!), a restaurant, cafeteria, bar, and sundries shop. And for the fitness enthusiast, there are ball courts and a fitness center. The center is a great place to spend a day when you'd like to take a break from the theme parks. Another Solara benefit - HOA takes care of your exterior grounds - so "easy living" for you! The home's location is ideal. You are only 3 miles from SR 192 which is dotted with convenient shopping/dining venues. It's 4 miles to Publix, where you can stock up on your essential shopping. And you're only about 10 miles to Disney property. Come see all that makes this property so special!

desc.en: Welcome to your extraordinary resort-style retreat in the coveted Windsor at Westside community! This stunning 9-bedroom, 6-bathroom home, situated on an OVERSIZED LOT, seamlessly combines luxury, comfort, and captivating views. With its generous number of bedrooms, desirable location within WALKING DISTANCE to the CLUBHOUSE, and a stunning pool with a hot tub makes this an amazing opportunity. Nestled on a curved street with a TRIANGULAR EXPANSIVE SIDE YARD, the property boasts a SUPERIOR LANDSCAPE that OUTSHINES its neighbors. RECENTLY PAINTED and beautifully FURNISHED, this home is being sold fully equipped. Step into your private oasis as you venture to the backyard, where the south-facing heated pool area awaits with abundant sunshine. The brick paver deck, spacious covered lanai, and generously sized built-in spa create an inviting outdoor space. Enjoy the added charm of a CONSERVATION AREA VIEW, ensuring no rear neighbors. Inside, discover an impeccably designed interior radiating elegance and sophistication, adorned HIGH-QUALITY FURNITURE. The open-concept floor plan seamlessly connects the living room, dining area, and gourmet kitchen in tile floring, providing easy cleaning and maintenance. The designer kitchen is a culinary delight, featuring 42" wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances, stone countertops, and a substantial breakfast bar with seating for up to 20 people - 16 at tables and 4 at the kitchen island, with overflow onto the patio. On the second floor, you'll find beautiful and new WOOD FLOOR TILES in all areas and bedrooms, as well as a transformed loft that serves as a fantastic GAME ROOM with a POOL TABLE, FOOSBALL TABLE, and CARD TABLE. Additionally, there is a separate MIDIA and TV ROOM for family movie nights. The master suite offers comfort and convenience, with a private ensuite bathroom that provides access to the pool deck. The ensuite bathroom is equipped with a rejuvenating shower, and a soaking tub. The remaining bedrooms have been meticulously designed to offer both comfort and style. A spacious mudroom leads to the laundry room, which includes a washer and dryer. Beyond the enchanting residence, Windsor at Westside offers resort-style amenities, including a clubhouse, fitness center, playgrounds, sports courts, and more. Essential services such as Internet, Cable, Lawn Care, and valet are covered by the HOA fee.

Welcome to your luxury vacation home, this immaculate home will not last long! This beautiful, nine-bedroom turn-key home comes fully furnished and is ready to enjoy while generating income! The open floor plan is perfect for entertaining or cooking for a large group! The kitchen has beautiful 42 inch wood cabinets, gorgeous granite countertops, a large island that offers additional seating, along with premium stainless steel appliances. From the dining and living rooms, you can take in the beautiful view of the pool area. Outside you have a large covered lanai with a half bath, pool and spa, along with a larger fenced yard with no rear neighbors. Encore at Reunion offers unparalleled on-site amenities in the area such as large, glamorous clubhouse with concierge services and guest ambassadors, fitness center, play den with babysitting services, huge water park area including splash park, water slides, pool and spa. For those who wish to stay fit or are keen into sports, there are tennis, basketball and volleyball courts. There is also a bar and restaurant on site which offer home delivery for your ease and pleasure as well as home chefs that can be booked in advance for the full "Encore Experience". ***THIS HOME IS LOCATED ONLY A FEW STEPS FROM THE CLUB HOUSE*** It's what you can call "The best of the best".

property.PropertyName: 1501 Sunset Pointe Place, Kissimmee, FL 34744 (MLS # S5098141)

desc.en: Experience breathtaking Florida LAKEFRONT SUNSETS from this stunning unique custom home in the exclusive gated community of Sunset Pointe. Situated near shopping, DISNEY/UNIVERSAL/SEA WORLD, major transportation arteries, hospitals, LAKE NONA, and NEO CITY and nestled among only 14 properties, this secluded oasis offers the perfect blend of privacy and convenience. This exceptional property sits on West Lake Tohopekaliga, recognized as one of FLORIDA'S BEST BASS FISHING LAKES, offering access to the Gulf/Atlantic through the Kissimmee Chain of Lakes and surrounded by a conservation area and Brownie Wise Park. With easy access to Historic Downtown Kissimmee, you can catch a SunRail train to downtown Orlando/Winter Park, launch a boat, enjoy a BBQ at the lakefront park, or indulge in local dining. Plus, the ORLANDO INT'L AIRPORT is just 16 miles away, and COCOA BEACH is a scenic 60-mile drive. The low maintenance exterior of the home boasts a barrel tile concrete roof and genuine Tennessee fieldstone, which carries through to the waterfalls in the lagoon-style saltwater pool and hot tub overlooking the lake. Enjoy the nighttime City of Kissimmee skyline and celebrate the 4th of July with a spectacular view of FIREWORKS across the horizon from your screened-in pool, lanai, hot tub, or lakeside fire pit. Step inside this luxurious home and discover a world of comfort and elegance. The primary suite features dual walk-in closets and vanities, a deep jetted tub, shower with dual heads/slide bars/seat, and direct access to the lanai. The updated kitchen is a chef's dream, boasting SS Bosch double oven and dishwasher, KitchenAid glass cooktop, a Samsung 4-door refrigerator, cast iron Kohler sink, prep island, instant hot water dispenser, wine rack, pull-out trays, tilt-out trays and granite countertops. The spacious utility room has a laundry tub, built-in cabinetry w/desk, solid surface countertops, space for a washer/two dryers, built-in ironing board and 3 built-in laundry hampers. Additional highlights include spacious 12' ceilings throughout, transom windows, bay windows, crown molding, architectural trim with tray/coffered ceilings, a gas ventless fireplace, 3 bookcases and abundant storage. Keep cool with a 3-zone A/C system for energy efficiency and comfort control, not to mention an 80-gallon hot water heater with recirculating pump, water filtration system with ozonator, carbon filter and softener. The garage is truly impressive, measuring over 1500 sf with 3 oversized doors (10x10 and 12x13), 12' and 14' ceilings, and a deep center bay for an RV/boat. It's also wired for EV charging and offers ample storage space, including shelving, two huge closets, a utility sink/cabinet above and attic storage. Room for all your tools and toys! Indulge in the ultimate entertainment experience with surround sound prewiring in the family room and primary bedroom, speaker prewiring on the lanai, intercom system and in-wall/ceiling speakers with volume controls throughout the home. Smart dimmer switches, Google Nest(R) doorbell, LED lighting and automatic night lights offer some of the latest technology and conveniences. If you enjoy spending your leisure time fishing, boating, bird/nature-watching, or simply relaxing by the lagoon-style saltwater pool with fountain and waterfalls, you won't want to miss the opportunity to own this CLEAN custom home of unparalleled quality and luxury. See floorplan and virtual tour.
